messages.title: Standing Strong for Truro and Falmouth
messages.content: Sarah Newton, Standing with Theresa May.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting Theresa May to secure a good deal for Britain as we leave the EU and to keep our economy strong.
Delivering the right Brexit: Sarah is backing Theresa May to get on with the job and make a success of Brexit and deliver the right deal for Britain.
Keeping the economy strong: By continuing to control public finances, taxes will be kept as low as possible and jobs will be created and protected.
Pledging to provide a good school place for every child, more affordable homes and strong national defences.

issues.brexitEurope: Delivering the right Brexit: Sarah is backing Theresa May to get on with the job and make a success of Brexit and deliver the right deal for Britain.
issues.economy: Keeping the economy strong: By continuing to control public finances, taxes will be kept as low as possible and jobs will be created and protected.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sarah Newton pledge: to provide a good school place for every child, more affordable homes and strong national defences.

endorsements.endorsement: Sarah Newton is a strong voice for Truro and Falmouth.

quotes.text: Sarah Newton is a strong voice for Truro and Falmouth.
